page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT SCRAPTOFT THURNBY
page.content: Unfortunately there is far too much unemployment in the area.Most people who do work go into Leicester and are employed in hosiery,knitwear,shoe- making,light engineering or service industries.Local jobs are in farming, nursery gardens,garages,shops and education.Schools and the Polytechnic provide employment for ancilliary workers as well as teachers and lecturers. Many young people are finding it very difficult to find a job when they leave school and this is some times blamed for the trouble and vandalism which is common especially on council estates.
